_header: In worship of that Maiden sweet / Mild Mary mother and maid
Title(s): Of Wymmen cometh this worldes welle
_description: ‘Of Wymmen comeþ þis worldes welle’ — ten l2-line stanzas with this refrain

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
In worschupe of þat Mayden sweteMylde Marie Moder and
                    May…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þouȝ I þus schortliche make an endeOf wymmen
                    comeþ þis worldes wele

                        ed.

                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.

         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
